title: Cruet Set, stand
description:
five bottle cruet set; cinquefoil body on scroll and volute feet; gallery around five compartments pierced with foliate scrolls; fluted and gadrooned lip; tall scroll and leaf handle; five cut bottles fitted with silver tops: 3 blind and 2 pierced; fully marked on underside of stand; maker\'s mark and lion passant on handle; 4 bottle tops unmarked; one with maker\'s mark and lion passant;
.1ab blind bottle; ,2ab blind bottle; .3ab blind bottle; .4ab pierced bottle; .5ab pierced bottle; .6 stand
creditline: Given in memory of Thomas L. Daniels by his famliy and friends
